title: Murder suspect who escaped Alabama jail is a 'monster' who vowed to kill his ex-girlfriend - Daily Mail
content:
1. Murder suspect who escaped Alabama jail is a 'monster' who vowed to kill his ex-girlfriend  Daily Mail
  2. Missing Alabama prison official had sold home, was expected to retire before murder suspect escaped  Fox News
  3. Search intensifies for fugitive Alabama inmate and corrections officer  CBS Mornings
  4. New details divulge in Lauderdale County inmate, corrections office escape  WAFF
  5. Colleagues of corrections officer are 'devastated' after she's accused of helping murder suspect escape from jail  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Casey White, 38, shot at his ex-girlfriend during a crime spree in December 2015. A police report says he 'stated that if he was released he would kill the victim.'
